thread.title: Brendan Rodgers & Stuart Armstrong: December awards double for Celtic
thread.title_full: Brendan Rodgers & Stuart Armstrong: December awards double for Celtic

title: Brendan Rodgers & Stuart Armstrong: December awards double for Celtic
text:
Read more about sharing. Rodgers and Armstrong show off their awards as Celtic enjoy a winter break in Dubai Celtic's Brendan Rodgers is the Scottish Premiership manager of the month for December, while Stuart Armstrong picked up the player award. 
Celtic won all eight of their league matches last month, taking them 19 points clear of nearest challengers Rangers. 
It is the third time Rodgers has won the monthly prize since taking over in the summer. 
Midfielder Armstrong, 24, scored five goals for the champions in December. Share this page
